_meta.notes: Island destination - prices vary by area. Seminyak/Canggu more expensive than Ubud/Sanur.

airports.name: Ngurah Rai International Airport

taxi_to_center.notes: Depends heavily on destination. Seminyak ~150k, Ubud ~350k. Use official taxi or pre-book.

legit_transport.name: Official Airport Taxi
legit_transport.notes: Prepaid counter in arrivals. Fixed rates by zone.

legit_transport.name: Grab
legit_transport.notes: Cannot pickup at airport - walk to pickup zone on road

legit_transport.name: Hotel Pickup
legit_transport.notes: Arrange in advance. Often similar price to taxi.

scam_warnings: Aggressive taxi touts - walk past them
Use official prepaid taxi counter only
Do not agree to 'tours' from drivers
Money changers near airport have poor rates
exit_tips: SIM card at arrivals - Telkomsel recommended
Grab pickup requires walk outside airport
Book hotel transfer in advance if arriving late

beer.notes: Large Bintang: warung ~30k, bar ~45k-60k, beach club ~70k+

tipping.notes: Not traditional but appreciated. Round up or 5-10% for good service.

payment.atm_notes: ATMs in tourist areas. BCA and Mandiri reliable. ~30k-50k fee. Watch for skimmers.

etiquette: Point with thumb, not index finger
scam_warnings: Money changers: use banks or authorized only
Taxi meter scams: use Grab or Bluebird
Broken scooter claims: photo everything before renting
Do not buy or use drugs - severe penalties
safety_tips: Traffic is chaotic - extreme caution on scooters
Monkeys will steal belongings - especially at Monkey Forest
Strong currents at beaches - check flags
Travel insurance essential - medical costs high
